biotools.summary:
Software for pathway/genome informatics and systems biology.

The Pathway Tools software performs computational genomics, metabolic reconstruction and modeling, and analysis of gene-expression and metabolomics data.

Pathway Tools is a comprehensive systems biology software system that is associated with the BioCyc database collection. The software has been licensed by more than 10,000 groups and powers a number of websites for biological databases. Pathway Tools integrates a broad set of capabilities that span genome informatics, pathway informatics, regulatory informatics, and omics data analysis. The software supports multiple use cases in bioinformatics and systems biology:.
